Telemedicine System for Remote Residents

  • Designed and developed a system to address the healthcare challenges faced by isolated communities.
  • Implemented in Java and using a MySQL database, the system empowers remote residents to register, upload health data, and receive real-time medical guidance from doctors. Furthermore, it facilitates direct messaging between users and doctors, fostering personalized remote healthcare support.

Tech Stack: Java, JavaFX, SQL, PostgreSQL

Time Series Forecasting: Stock Prices

  • Applied time series analysis techniques to predict stock prices, leveraging historical data and implementing models for accurate forecasting. Utilized advanced algorithms such as recurrent neural networks (RNNs) to capture intricate patterns and trends in financial markets.
  • Achieved 70% improvement in forecasting accuracy, providing valuable insights for informed investment decisions.

Tech Stack: Python, JupyterLab, pandas, yfinance, scikit-learn
